headline: Pete Buttigieg and the 1 Percent
abstract: Are the wealthy a liability in 2020? Or will they help get him elected?
lead_paragraph: At an annual charity fund-raiser in October, Anna Wintour, the editor of Vogue, shared a table with the designer Michael Kors and Pete Buttigieg, then the mayor of South Bend, Ind., who wore one of his trademark navy suits.
